subtitle: A good vegetable accompaniment to most main meals.

method.text: Place mange-tout and baby sweetcorn in a pan of boiling water. Return to boil then place a metal colander or steamer over the top with the broccoli in. Cover and simmer for 7-8 min or until all vegetables are tender.
Meanwhile, place butter in a small pan with the garlic and heat gently until melted and well mixed.
Drain vegetables well. Return to the clean saucepan, pour over the butter and garlic mixture, and toss well to coat. Spoon into a warmed serving dish.

title: Garlic tossed vegetable medley
